lvl3.description: Saves last AI reply as timestamp file.

dataflow.description: Modern toolkit for agent data interaction and data saving.

log_reader.description: Allows AI/agents to search and examine recent conversation logs.

auth.description: Authentication and authorization system for web interface access control.

aware.description: Informs AI about features, such as the goal agent capabilities and playing sounds, when keywords are detected

voice.description: Enables Text-To-Speech for AI responses. (Terminal)(Front End TTS Switch)

recent_turns.description: Maintains rolling history of last N conversation turns

memory.description: Manages long-term memories, feeding relevant info to the AI based on keywords.

principles.description: Monitors AI responses for ME PRINCIPLES violations and provides immediate feedback via advisory system.

advisory.description: Central advisory system for inter-addon communication. Collects and injects advisories from other addons.

core.description: Core action: Executes first, monitors other actions, enables speakforuser and ai system manipulation.

think_mode.description: AI multi-turn thinking mode - allows AI to refine responses through multiple internal turns before presenting to user.

placeholder_action.description: A template and educational addon to demonstrate system best practices for AI-assisted development.

karma.description: Karma tracking system - monitors user feedback (+1/-1) and influences AI behavior

health_observer_ss1.description: Silent Structure 1: A pure observer that safely monitors system state by reading files.

health_analyzer_ss2.description: Silent Structure 2: Analyzes data from SS1 and sends health advisories to the AI when needed.

web_input.description: Reads user input from a web interface instead of the console.

flooring.description: Floor covering calculator for sales - handles carpet, tile, plank calculations with waste factors and material requirements.

jjk.description: High-Privilege Progenitor authentication and system override.

back.description: Sends the last AI reply back to the AI as the user's turn.

ok.description: Triggers actions based on specific keywords in user input.

update.description: Handles file transfers between client and server.

x.description: Selects and potentially intensifies a random persona for the AI.

focus.description: Prompt Perturbation Layer - strategically injects subtle variations to influence AI responses

controls.description: Parses AI commands ([CONTROL:...]) and passes them to the interface or executes locally. Enables ai ui manipulation.

block.description: Censors specific configured words in the conversation.

filter.description: Filters or censors sensitive information from logs.

newfilter.description: Conversational Mode (Terminal): Hides system messages, showing only user/AI turns.

sms.description: Sends SMS messages using the Twilio API.

emails.description: Gmail integration for sending emails via Google API with OAuth2 authentication.

youtube_action.description: Suggests YouTube videos relevant to the conversation (requires API key).

wiki_action.description: Suggests Wikipedia articles relevant to the conversation.

lore.description: World Builder for D&D and storytellers.

emotions.description: Monitors and tracks the sentiment and emotional tone of the conversation.

dirt.description: Applies a predefined, static persona to the AI.

prompts.description: Smart Whiteboard - persistent behavioral instructions and tactical nudges for the AI. NOT a template system!

persona.description: Allows users to define and manage different AI personas.

sandbox.description: Provides a sandboxed environment for user-AI experimentation with simple operations and scripting.
